'''1.4.5'''<ref>https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/36134682905/minecraft-145</ref> is a minor update to {{JE}} that was released on November 19, 2012,<ref name=pre>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2012/11/minecraft-1-4-5-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2012/11/minecraft-1-4-5-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.4.5 Pre-release|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=November 16, 2012}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Java Edition 1.4.4|1.4.4]]. It is compatible with 1.4.4 servers.

A [[Java Edition 1.4.5 (pre-release)|pre-release version of 1.4.5]] was released on November 16, 2012.<ref name=pre/> This pre-release was later reuploaded,<ref>{{tweet|SeargeDP|270471030240313345|The Minecraft 1.4.5 snapshot has been updated by Mojang. MCP needs to be updated to support the new version. I'll stream it in 8-9 hours.|19 Nov 12}}</ref> and this reupload proceeded to become the full release of 1.4.5.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
[[File:Map (item) JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] '''[[Map]]'''
* Now showing all of the players correctly in multiplayer.

=== Mobs ===
[[File:Wither Skeleton JE1 BE1.png|width=43x43]] '''[[Wither Skeleton]]'''
* Now spawns in [[Nether Fortress]]es that generated in old versions.
